quote.content: Saying that today is gloomy is a fallacy and subject to ambiguity.
quote.author: Kenneth

quote.content: Sometimes in life it's not about winning.
quote.author: Max

quote.content: I played with fire and I burnt myself.
quote.author: Kenneth

quote.content: The search for meaning can give meaning even when there is no meaning to be found.
quote.author: Max

quote.content: We're not in control, daemons are. We could try to make a difference but that's bullshit. Intentions are irrelevant. They don't drive us. Daemons do.
quote.author: Kenneth

quote.content: Today feels good with a pinch of salt. These diagrams are full of holes and incoherent.
quote.author: Max
